content.webTitle: Pick of the week: London: Classical Music and Opera

fields.headline: Pick of Week: Classical Music and Opera
fields.bodyText: Lohengrin Royal Opera House, WC2, Mon 27 Apr Semyon Bychkov conducts the latest revival of Elijah Moshinsky's production. Angela Hewitt Royal Festival Hall, SE1, Wed 29 Apr Just one work, Bach's Goldberg Variations, from the Bach specialist. Alice Coote Wigmore Hall, W1, Fri 1 May An all-English programme of works from the outstanding English mezzo.
